task.question: How many of Jacob's family went down into Egypt (Ex. 1:5)?
As Joseph's generation died, what did the Israelites do in Egypt (Ex. 1:7)?

choices.choice: Worshipped other gods
Multiplied
Became wealthy
Spread out in the land of Egypt

task.question: How was the oppressive new king of Egypt identified (Ex. 1:8)?

choices.choice: As one who did not know about Joseph
As one who feared neither God nor man
As one who was hard hearted
As one who served other gods

task.answer: As one who did not know about Joseph

task.question: Besides Pithom, what other city did the Israelites build (Ex. 1:11)?

choices.choice: Amon-Re
Giza
Amarna
Rameses

task.question: What did the new King of Egypt fear in regard to the Israelites

choices.choice: They would plunder the wealth of Egypt
They would destroy the gods of Egypt
They would join Egypt's enemies in war
They would intermarry with the Egyptians

task.answer: They would join Egypt's enemies in war

task.question: With what two substances did the Egyptians make the Israelites' lives bitter with hard labor (Ex. 1:14)?

choices.choice: Stone and chisels
Brick and mortar
Yoke and oxen
Sickle and hoe

task.question: What did the king command the Hebrew midwives to do (Ex. 1:16)?

choices.choice: Kill all the babies of the Israelites
Throw the Israelite babies into the river
Kill the mothers before they had their babies
Kill all the male Israelite babies

task.answer: Kill all the male Israelite babies

task.question: What were the names of the Hebrew midwives (Ex. 1:15)?

choices.choice: Shiphrah and Puah
Ruth and Naomi
Asenath and Potiphar
Zipporah and Miriam

task.question: What motivated the midwives to refuse to do what the king of Egypt had commanded them (Ex. 1:17)?

choices.choice: They obeyed the voice of the Lord
They had compassion on the children
They had compassion on the Israelite mothers
They feared God

task.question: What excuse did the midwives give the King of Egypt explaining why they let the babies live (Ex. 1:19)?

choices.choice: God had protected the Israelite babies
The Hebrew women gave birth before they got there
The Israelite men protected their babies
The babies were hidden before they arrived

task.answer: The Hebrew women gave birth before they got there
